Participants.evidence: patients with IVH on the stability CT scan

Intervention.evidence: Exposure was minimally invasive surgery plus alteplase (MIS+alteplase).

Method_Outcome.evidence: Primary outcome was deltaIVH defined as IVH volume on end-of-treatment CT minus IVH volume on stability CT scan.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Of 499 patients in MISTIE-III, 310 (62.1%) had IVH on stability scans

Number_Analysed.evidence: A total of 146 (47.1%) received the MISTIE procedure and 164 (52.9%) standard medical care (SMC) only.

Result_Outcome.evidence: MIS+alteplase was associated with greater deltaIVH in multivariable linear regression analysis adjusted for potential confounders (beta, −0.80; 95%CI, −1.37 to −0.22; p=0.007).
